title: Legal Officers of AGs Dept express solidarity with AG
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Legal Officers’ Association of the Attorney General’s Department has expressed grace concern over the unprofessional and unethical conduct of a group of Attorneys-at-Law who gathered at the entrance of the new building of the AGs Department on 5th April 2022.

The Association categorically denies and notes with grave concern on the baseless and unfounded allegations made in respect of the Attorney General and the AGs Department on cases pending before the court.
The Legal Officers’ Association of the Attorney General’s Department has expressed solidarity with the Attorney General, and will meet any challenge, as members of the official bar, it added.
